sentences.english: The Treasury strongly opposes this approach.
sentences.chinese: 财政部强烈反对这种方法。

sentences.english: Article 7 The department of finance under the State Council shall administer the accounting work throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 第七条国务院财政部门主管全国的会计工作。

sentences.english: Deputy Finance Minister Li Yong stayed in Trujillo.
sentences.chinese: 财政部副部长李勇仍留在特鲁希略。

sentences.english: I think this is what the Treasury Department says, that they are kinda busy with other things until then.
sentences.chinese: 想必财政部会托词说，他们到那时才有时间。

sentences.english: Then his finance ministry sent a deficit-reduction plan to the European Commission.
sentences.chinese: 接着他的财政部向欧洲委员会发送了减少赤字的计划。

sentences.english: Sooner or later the US Treasury and the Fed had to draw the line and the financial sector will eventually be healthier as a result.
sentences.chinese: 美联储和财政部迟早会出手，最终金融机构也会康复。

sentences.english: Many Canberrans are employed by government departments such as the Australian Treasury.
sentences.chinese: 许多堪培拉人都雇佣于政府部门，如澳大利亚财政部。

sentences.english: Article5. The department of finance under the State Councilshall administer the accounting work throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 第五条国务院财政部门管理全国的会计工作。

sentences.english: That's more than you'll get from even a 30-year Treasury at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 比那个财政部现在标售的30年期的国债收益都要高。

sentences.english: Sri Mulyani Indrawati is Managing Director of the World Bank Group and a former finance minister of Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 世界银行集团常务董事，曾任印尼财政部长。

sentences.english: ROBINSON Alright collect taxes through the Treasury. Veteran's Affairs?
sentences.chinese: 通过财政部收税，好。退伍军人事务部？

sentences.english: Huhne’s reforms, worked out in conjunction with the Treasury, focus on four areas.
sentences.chinese: 胡纳的改革，曾与财政部一起进行，侧重于四个领域。

sentences.english: Kanyong articles on this website, authorized in writing by the treasury.
sentences.chinese: 本网站刊用的文章，由财政部书面授权。

sentences.english: Nor did the Ministry of Finance, which funds government procurement.
sentences.chinese: 负责为政府采购提供资金的财政部也没有回复。

sentences.english: The ctiteria for small-scale taxpayers sell be reg -ulated by the Ministry of Finance.
sentences.chinese: 小规模纳税人的标准由财政部规定。

sentences.english: The first is HM Treasury which is responsible for the oe\verall economic framework and for fiscal policy in particular.
sentences.chinese: 财政部负责整体经济框架，尤其是财政政策。
